Instance.description: Autonomous picker interaction that selects an object from a subject's inventory.

TdescFragTag.name: additional_item_test
TdescFragTag.description: A set of tests to run on each object in the inventory that passes the inventory_item_test. Each object must pass first the inventory_item_test and then the additional_item_test before it will be shown in the picker dialog. Only tests with ParticipantType.Object will work

TunableEnum.name: hidden_inventory_test
TunableEnum.description: Optionally restrict picker objects to only hidden or non-hidden inventories. If set to 'Any', objects in both the hidden inventory and non hidden inventory will be considered when populating the picker.

TunableVariant.name: inventory_item_test
TunableVariant.description: A test to run on the objects in the inventory to determine which objects will show up in the picker. An object test type left un-tuned is considered any object.

Tunable.name: actual_object
Tunable.description: The object we want to test ownership of

TunableEnum.name: test_type
TunableEnum.description: How to test the tags in the tag set against the objects on the lot.

TunableEnum.name: inventory_subject
TunableEnum.description: Subject on which the inventory exists.

TunableVariant.name: suppress_duplicate_objects
TunableVariant.description: If checked, only a single copy of objects with the same definition/stack id will be shown.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: Objects can be suppressed by different ways.
